ModMetaData.name: Kit's Portuguese Pack
ModMetaData.author: Kitsune
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to add portuguese translation to some mods :)
Supported Mods: - Vanilla Achievements Expanded - Vanilla Expanded Framework - Vanilla Social Interactions Expanded - Vanilla Storytellers Expanded - Empress Evil - Vanilla Storytellers Expanded - Freya Fierce - Vanilla Storytellers Expanded - Igor Invader - Vanilla Storytellers Expanded - Oskar Obnoxious - Vanilla Storytellers Expanded - Perry Persistent - Vanilla Traits Expanded - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Coilguns - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Grenades - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Heavy Weapons - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Laser - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Makeshift - Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Quickdraw
